## Introduction

This is a notebook of general figures and graphics for the S2 MET project.

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)


```



## Collaborator Map

```{r}

library(maps)
library(ggmap)
library(mapdata)


## Get a map of US
# States
states <- map_data("state")

ggplot(data = states) + 
  geom_polygon(aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), fill = "grey", color = "white") +
  coord_fixed(1.3) +
  theme_classic()




```
